title: Navaratan Bangles - Diamond-studded Kadas
features: A pair of exquisite kadas with a modern geometric design featuring alternating square and circular motifs. Each motif is meticulously set with brilliant round-cut diamonds that radiate light. The design allows easy fitting through any wrist. The bangles feature a smooth, seamless finish ensuring comfortable wear and easy access to any wrist
description: These kadas combine the brilliance of diamonds with the timeless appeal of gold. The simple, geometric design offers a modern take on traditional Indian jewelry. The diamonds used are of high clarity, adding a touch of luxury, all these are designed for daily wear with a touch of style.
